fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: All files (both legislative and non-legislative) in energy, environment, climate change, trade, digital, transport, food & drink and finance policy. Provide research and information services in other policy areas on demand.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: COULET#Cecil, FAVALE#Martina, Frumenzi#Luisa, Karklina#Anna, SAENZ DE BURUAGA SANCHEZ#Blanca, SARKISSIAN#Igor, TONETTO#Elena, Wilson#Mark
goals__remit: A business information service focused on providing EU policy and legislative developments.
relevant_communication:
OPP Group SPRL is an online business information company that specialise in EU affairs.  
 
We supply digital policy tools via our website to public affairs professionals including NGOs, industry associations, companies, think tanks and academia.
